title: Wearing Your UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
description:
In this video, learn how to fit your UA Band.

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.

asset.title: Wearing Your UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
asset.description:
In this video, learn how to fit your UA Band.

For more about UA HealthBox, visit: http://undrarmr.co/1RtqEZK

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: The ua band tracks your sleep fitness and activity to make sure you're getting the best results be sure you have it fitted correctly. Place the ua band on your wrist and then insert the other end of the strap through the buckle adjust the strap until it fits snugly and fasten the clasp to get the most accurate resting heart rate reading from your ua band wear it approximately one finger with up from your wrist if you have a smaller wrist or find that your band is too loose you can replace the strap with the smaller strap that came with your ua band to replace the strap first take off the original strap insert the provided pin in the small hole on the underside until you hear a click then carefully pull out the current strap attach the replacement strap to the main portion of the band. Push and press the two towards one another firmly to lock them in place, now you're ready to own your day with the ua band.
